documentation.text: @dev mapping the store the ether and erc20 token balances
@dev Function to deposit ether from the splitter
@dev mapping the store the ether and erc20 token balances
@dev Function to deposit ether from the splitter

depositEther().details: Function to deposit ether from the splitter

params._amount: is the amount of tokens to be deposited by the splitter
params._tokenAddress: is the address of the ERC20 token that will be deposited

splitToken(address,(address,uint256)[],u.details: function to split tokens to recipient addresses based on the percentage of shares allocated to themThe token isn't transferred to their wallets yet, but it is transferred to their token balance in the contract

params._amount: is amount of tokens from which every recipients will be issued tokens.This is the amount to be splitted among the recipients
params._recipients: is an array of Struct that contains the address and the share percentage of each recipients
params._tokenAddress: is the address of the token (ERC20 or ETHER) that will be splitted to the recipients' balances

withDraw(uint256,address).details: Withdraw function to be called by recipients. Calling this function sends the token to their wallet address

params._amount: is that amount of tokens (ERC20 or ETHER) to be withdrawn by the recipient
params._tokenAddress: is the address of the token (ERC20 or ETHER) where the token will be withdrawn from

_tokenBalances.details: mapping the store the ether and erc20 token balances

depositToken(address,uint256).notice: IERC20 _tokenToDeposit = IERC20(_token). Creates an instance of the method of the token contract_tokenToDeposit.transferFrom. This contract must have been approved for successful function call

withDraw(uint256,address).notice: that re entrancy attack is blocked
